response.overview: Big money artists and mega-collectors pay a high price when art collides with commerce. After a series of paintings by an unknown artist are discovered, a supernatural force enacts revenge on those who have allowed their greed to get in the way of art.
response.title: Velvet Buzzsaw

titles.title: ベルベット・バズソー: 血塗られたギャラリー

cast.name: Sofia Toufa
cast.character: Wife at Art Basel Will Call

cast.name: Keith Bogart
cast.character: Husband at Art Basel Will Call
